property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ahkara enters play, put a Ghoul ally token into play with 3 [Melee] ATK / 3 health.

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn, destroy an ally in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy and number of Diseases you control. Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to each opposing ally for each Disease destroyed this way.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: If your hero would deal damage, it deals that much +1 instead. When your hero deals damage, it heals 1 damage from itself.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target ally. That ally has -1 health this turn for each Disease you control.

property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Destroy on of your equipment --> Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Ready a Ghoul in your party.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Exhaust --> This turn, target opposing hero or ally must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Opposing cards and effects must target your hero if able. Your hero has +10 health and is a protector.

property.name: Type
property.value: Ally Token

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Greathelm of the Scourge Champion is destroyed, you may put it from its owner's graveyard into his hand at the start of the next turn.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Greatsword of the Ebon Blade enters play, at the start of the next turn, destroy it unless you pay 3.

property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grogmar has ferocity while you have a weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest. Reward: Choose one: Put a +1 ATK counter on one of your weapons; or draw a card. If your hero is a Death Knight, you may choose both.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero. Allies in attached hero's party have -1 ATK.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Interrupt target ability or ally card. If you do, exhaust all of its controller's resources.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero. When damage is dealt this way, target ally in attached hero's party has -1 health this turn.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, if no Ghouls are in your party, you may remove target ally card in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a Ghoul ally token into play with 3 [Melee] ATK / 3 health.

property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3, Flip Randolphe --> Each opposing hero and ally has -1 ATK this turn for each damage on it.

property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rantuko readies, he deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runed Soulblade enters play, you may destroy an ally in your party. If you do, your hero deals X shadow damage to target ally, where X was the ATK of that ally you destroyed.

property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3, Flip Saeryn -> Put target weapon card from your graveyard into hand.

property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector When you strike with a weapon, you may ready Tal'zin.

property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector Each ally in combat with Valeos has -1 ATK for each damage on that ally.

property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vanessa is destroyed, put a Ghoul ally token into play with 3 [Melee] ATK / 3 health.

property.name: Class
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wanda is elusive and untargetable while you have a weapon.
